thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Christina Bawden

author: Christina Bawden
title: Christina Bawden
text: I found the staff very helpful, initially I made an error in booking and they righted this for me but when I got the confirmation is was a little confusing as it thanked me for my deposit which I hadnt paid yet, however when I clicked the link for my details there was a button there for the deposit. So overall the service was great and I cannot fault the help Nicole gave me with queries. I would definitely recommend them.
